name: W.L. GORE & ASSOCIATES
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to hydrogen power and fuel cell programs.

High performance military clothing; Issues related to the Kissell Amendment; Best value contracting; Funding issues related to the Soldier Enhancement Program and Rapid Equipping Force.
